    public class ImgButton
extends Button
    A Material Fab and Icon button that has an Image instead of a material icon.
    Author:
    Mohamed Ilyes DIMASSI

      • createFabI

        public static Button createFabI(ButtonFabColor color,
                Ripple ripple,
                com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Image img)
        Setup a fab button.
        Parameters:
        color - the background color, should be one of the options provided by ButtonFabColor
        ripple - determines whether the button has a ripple, one of the options provided by Ripple
        img - the icon to be set for the button
        Returns:
        a fab button
        See Also:
        Button.createFab(ButtonFabColor, Ripple, String)

      • createIconI

        public static Button createIconI(Ripple ripple,
                 com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Image img)
        Setup an icon button.
        Parameters:
        ripple - determines whether the button has a ripple, one of the options provided by Ripple
        img - a material icon font code
        Returns:
        an icon button
        See Also:
        Button.createIcon(ButtonColor, Ripple, String)

      • createMiniFabI

        public static Button createMiniFabI(ButtonFabColor color,
                    Ripple ripple,
                    com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Image img)
        Setup a mini fab material button.
        Parameters:
        color - the background color, should be one of the options provided by ButtonFabColor
        ripple - determines whether the button has a ripple, one of the options provided by Ripple
        img - a material icon font code
        Returns:
        A mini baf button
        See Also:
        Button.createMiniFab(ButtonFabColor, Ripple, String)

        Sets an image for the button.
        Parameters:
        img - the image that will be placed at the center of the button
